Question: Urban Armor Gear, LLC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Urban Armor Gear, LLC

Product Highlight: UAG Mobile Accessories

- Rugged Apple Watch Ultra watch bands and a case for the Galaxy Z Fold 4
- Active Strap with elastic webbing material, Velcro closure, and stainless steel hardware
- NATO ECO strap made from recycled materials with durable nylon weave and stainless steel hardware
- Civilian strap made of soft silicone material with multiple openings for ventilation
- Civilian case for the Galaxy Z Fold 4 with raised edges for protection, certified MIL-STD 810G-516.6, and adhesive stripe stickers
- UAG's signature pattern inspired by jerry cans for high-quality, military-grade strength
- Third-party certified to Military Standards (MIL-STD 810G 516.6)
- Known for rugged and thin cases for various devices
- Widely available at major retailers and online at UrbanArmorGear.com
Summary_cn:
都市军用装备有限责任公司

产品亮点：UAG 手机配件

- 针对Apple Watch的结实超级手表表带以及Galaxy Z Fold 4的保护套
- 具有弹性织带材料、尼龙粘扣以及不锈钢五金的主动腕带
- 采用可回收材料制作、具有耐用的尼龙编织和不锈钢五金的NATO ECO腕带
- 采用柔软硅胶材质制作、具有多个通风孔的平民腕带
- 采用凸起边缘用于保护、符合MIL-STD 810G-516.6标准并带有粘贴带贴纸的Galaxy Z Fold 4平民保护壳
- UAG独特的标志图案灵感来自于便携油桶，具有高质量的军用级别强度
- 第三方已认证符合军用标准（MIL-STD 810G 516.6）
- 以坚固而薄的外壳而闻名，适用于各种设备
- 在主要零售商和UrbanArmorGear.com网站上广泛可得到
